imdb.plot outline: A dramatic and intimate encounter with the animal kingdom's most powerful and ingenious "Weapons" and "Defence systems". Exploring this remarkable world of weaponry takes us on a global journey, from the arid plains of central Australia, to the sweeping Serengeti grasslands and into the jungles of Central and South America.
imdb.title: Weapons of the Wild
plot: A dramatic and intimate encounter with the animal kingdom's most powerful and ingenious "Weapons" and "Defence systems". Exploring this remarkable world of weaponry takes us on a global journey, from the arid plains of central Australia, to the sweeping Serengeti grasslands and into the jungles of Central and South America.
